title: A.I.R. Gallery's Annual Postcard Show: Wish You Were Here
description: An exhibition featuring postcard-sized artworks to benefit women and non-binary artists.

title: Free Junior's Mini Strawberries + Cream Cheesecake
description: A promotional event featuring free cheesecake at Junior's x Wimbledon food truck.

title: Dixon Place’s Hot! Festival
description: The world’s longest-running LGBTQIA+ arts festival featuring theater, dance, and music.

title: Free Outdoor Movies
description: Outdoor movie screenings at various locations including Bryant Park and Hudson.

title: Angelika ‘Classics’ Screening Series
description: Screening of classic films at Village East by Angelika.

title: Broadway by the Boardwalk
description: An outdoor concert series featuring Broadway stars at Clinton Cove in Hudson River Park.

title: Biology on Tap: 'It’s Getting Hot' Edition
description: A speaker series blending biology and beer at Pete's Candy Store.

title: Red White + Vintage Bazaar at Grand Bazaar NYC
description: An indoor and outdoor market featuring vintage goods and food at Grand Bazaar NYC.
address: 100 W 77th St at Columbus Ave, UWS

title: Korea Fest x Philippines Fest and Japan Fes
description: A cultural festival featuring performances and activities from Korea, the Philippines, and Japan.
address: Lexington Ave between East 43rd and 48th Streets

title: 54th Annual International African Arts Festival
description: A festival celebrating African and Caribbean culture with performances, artisans, and food vendors at Commodore Barry Park.

title: Union Pool’s 13th Annual Summer Thunder Concert Series
description: Free afternoon concerts featuring various artists at Union Pool.

title: Soul Summit
description: A house music dance party at Knockdown Center.

title: Summer on the Hudson: Amplified Sundays
description: An outdoor live music series at Riverside Park South featuring local bands.

title: Say Less: A Too Truthful Comedy Show
description: A comedy show with personal stories and live music.

title: Venezuelan Cultural Fest
description: A celebration of Venezuelan culture featuring food, music, and more at CultureLab LIC in Queens.

title: The Classical Theater of Harlem: Will Power's Memnon
description: An outdoor production of Will Power's play about the Ethiopian king Memnon at the Richard Rogers Amphitheater.

title: This is Spinal Tap 41st Anniversary Screenings
description: Screening of the classic mockumentary film in select theaters.

title: Lincoln Center’s Fourth Annual Summer for the City
description: An arts festival featuring free and choose-what-you-pay events at Lincoln Center.

title: Silent Disco
description: A monthly silent disco event at Riverside Park’s Pier I with three DJs spinning different genres.

title: Tom D’s Big New York Show
description: A comedy show featuring NYC history, trivia, and special guests.

title: Feel the News with Marcela Onyango
description: A variety comedy show featuring guests and supporting mutual aid projects.

title: The Drunk Texts: Forsooth! Jaws
description: A comedic take on the classic film Jaws with audience participation.
